manifest.name: BarFight
manifest.description: BarFight is set in a 1950's Hollywood Western movie set - where the extras compete to impress the director as the inevitable bar fight breaks out. The game is an MMO and a chat room. You can meet up with your friends, chat, play a round of poker, listen to the piano player as you watch the dancing girls...oh...and smash each other over the head with chairs of course! All in glorious third person perspective (also in actual 3D if you bring your own glasses!). The wardrobe department lets you customize your character and set your stats.

manifest.name: Beatlab
manifest.description: Beatlab is the easiest way to create music and share it with your friends. Create music using a simple expressive interface that requires no knowledge of music theory or instruments.  You can start from scratch, or remix the musical ideas of others.

manifest.name: Dave's Galaxy
manifest.description: Conquer the Galaxy in less than 10 Minutes a Day

manifest.name: Favimon (beta)
manifest.description: Favimon is a web-based game in which you battle your favourite websites, building a collection of icons as you attempt to conquer the web! Works best in Firefox 3.6+.

manifest.name: Kleki
manifest.description: A modern painting and image editing tool.

manifest.name: Lanyrd Mobile
manifest.description: Get the most out of conferences and professional events. The Lanyrd mobile web app is a great way for you to get more out of the event whilst you're there. On HTML5 compatible devices it stores information about the conferences you are tracking or attending; so even when there's no WiFi available you're able to view the conference schedule and see the attendee and speaker directories. The Lanyrd web app integrates with your Twitter account, so you can easily follow other speakers and attendees at the touch of a button.

manifest.name: LineRage
manifest.description: You are a line. Don't hit things.

manifest.name: Lord of Ultima
manifest.description: Lord of Ultima is EA's popular browser based strategy game that simulates an immersive medieval civilization.

ru.description: Lord of Ultima – популярная браузерная стратегия от EA, которая погружает игроков во времена средневековых феодальных распрей.

fr.description: Lord of ultima est un jeu extrêmement populaire d’EA, qui se joue directement depuis votre navigateur, et qui immerge le joueur dans la civilisation médiévale.

en.description: Lord of Ultima is EA's popular browser based strategy game that simulates an immersive medieval civilization.

pt_BR.description: Lord of Ultima é o mais recente jogo de estratégia da EA que simula a civilização medieval e que se joga directamente no browser.

pt_PT.description: Lord of Ultima é o mais recente jogo de estratégia da EA que simula a civilização medieval e que se joga directamente no browser.

de.description: Lord of Ultima ist das beliebte Browser-Strategie-Spiel von EA: Bauen Sie die Stadt Ihrer Träume, schmieden Sie mächtige Allianzen und führen Sie Ihr Heer in epischen Feldzügen gegen Ihre Widersacher zum Sieg.

it.description: Lord of Ultima è il popolare gioco di strategia in versione browser che simula una civiltà medioevale.

es_ES.description: Lord of Ultima es el popular juego de estrategia de EA que simula una inmersión en una civilización medieval.

pl.description: Lord of Ultima to popularna strategiczna gra przeglądarkowa, symulująca niesamowity świat cywilizacji średniowiecza.

manifest.name: Lucidchart
manifest.description: Anyone can diagram! Create a quick and easy diagram at Lucidchart.com.

manifest.name: MARBLE RUN
manifest.description: What is MARBLE RUN all about? It's about fun and easy gameplay. It's about creativeness and playfulness. It's about being a part of a big piece, actually a big marble run. Everyone is invited to build a track and add it to the big marble run. By doing so we will all create the longest marble run ever in history. The longer the run gets, the more special bricks will be available allowing us to build even more creative and awesome tracks.Long story short - it's all about building stuff like we all did when we were little kids.

manifest.name: Mad Tanks TD
manifest.description: Tower Defense game. In the future wars will be fought by automated tanks. In the year of 2070 something went wrong with the A.I. and now you have to defend against mad machines. There are 20 bases to defend. Killing all tanks gives you a perfect win. Please read in-game help for keyboard shortcuts. IE is not supported, it works, but poorly.

manifest.name: Manifest Checker
manifest.description: A development tool and demonstration app that helps you check your open web app manifests.

manifest.name: Mozilla QA WebRT Tester
manifest.description: An app for running web runtime test cases with native applications

manifest.name: OpenOdyssey
manifest.description: Help mythical Odysseus to return home in classical top-down shooter.

manifest.name: Petoo SnowBall
manifest.description: Find if You can beat false santa in snowball.

en.name: Petoo SnowBall
en.description: Find if You can beat false santa in snowball.

pl.name: Petoo SnowBall
pl.description: Sprawdź czy pokonasz fałszywego mikołaja na snieżki.

manifest.name: Picozu Image Editor
manifest.description: Picozu Editor is a drawing and photo retouching application built on Javascript, HTML 5 and CSS3. Make sure you use a modern browser (Firefox 5, Safari 5, Chrome, Opera 10, Internet Explorer 9) if you want to play with it.

manifest.name: Rainbooth
manifest.description: Snap pictures and share them with friends!

manifest.name: Remember The Milk
manifest.description: Task management goodness used by millions worldwide. Makes managing your to-do list fun!

manifest.name: Robots Are People Too
manifest.description:
RAPT is a complex and challenging HTML5 platformer.  The exit to each level is blocked by enemies that roll, jump, fly, and shoot to prevent escape at all costs.  Gameplay is exclusively two-player and uses a unique split-screen mechanic.  The levels and enemies are designed to promote cooperation between players.

RAPT also comes with a powerful level editor which allows players to create levels of any size.  Levels are saved to the player's account on the server, which has a public page listing custom levels.  Link to this page to share your levels with friends.

manifest.name: Roundball
manifest.description: Roundball is a fun match three puzzle game where you form horizontal or vertical lines of at least three similar objects by swapping two adjacent items. The more matches you make, the higher your score. Two game modes: Classic and Timed mode. Works on regular computer or on touchscreens.

manifest.name: Sandglaz
manifest.description: Simply powerful Todo's - Personal and Team Task Management

manifest.name: Sinuous
manifest.description: Avoid the red dots in this fun and addictive game.

manifest.name: Sketch
manifest.description: Draw sketches with animating lines in pseudo 3D

manifest.name: SoundCloud
manifest.description: Share Your Sounds

manifest.name: Springpad
manifest.description: Create and share notebooks for any interest - on the web and on your phone.

manifest.name: Steamcube
manifest.description: A simple 2.5D brain teaser block puzzle game. Find out how far can you get before time runs out?

manifest.name: StillAliveJS
manifest.description:
StillAliveJS, or SaJS, is a puzzle game inspired by Portal: The Flash Version which is a 2D renewal of Portal, developed by Valve Corporation.

SaJS consists primarily in a series of platform puzzles that must be solved by teleporting the character and other simple objects using a Portal Gun. The unusual physics allowed by this device is the emphasis of StillAliveJS.

manifest.name: The Boston Globe
manifest.description: A leading news source for Massachusetts, breaking news, business, sports, health, arts & entertainment, politics, education, cars, jobs, real estate & more.

manifest.name: The Times Crossword
manifest.description: Play The Times Crossword!

manifest.name: Vector Racer
manifest.description: Vector Racer is a turn-based racing game, which simulates a car race on a squared sheet of paper. You move from one grid point to another and have to try to get to the finish in the least amount of turns.

manifest.name: Web Snooker
manifest.description: Free online web-based snooker game

manifest.name: Z-Type
manifest.description: A Space Shoot'em'up where you type to shoot.

manifest.name: Zlizer
manifest.description: Slice or join quicly! Simple and entertaining math game. Add or divide quickly to get magic number as the numbers fall, or you'll lose! It's speed math! Works on regular computer or on touchscreens.
Building awesome stuff can be a real challenge. Blossom helps you to stay lean & productive.
manifest.name: blossom - Lean Product Management
eBay Web App
manifest.description: The new eBay Mozilla Firefox App is here to give you a great visual buying experience on eBay!  The eBay Mozilla Firefox App is built using the latest web technologies bringing you exciting features including: - Infinitely scrolling search results with multiple image centric views - View item pages with easy access to search results and seller information - Streamlined homepage with visual category search - Personalized homepage for signed in users.
